creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: red ground with thin white stripes--green, maroon, blue, orange and white stripes at center front and back, and sides; brocaded multicolored horizontal designs of zigzags, running chevrons, lines and diamonds; V-neck
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
